text: Egha Iesus mɨgɨa ghua ghaze, “Oio, ia Jerusalemɨn adarazi, kɨ ian apangkufi! Ia Godɨn akam inigha izir gumazibav sozi me ariaghɨri, egha God ia bagha amadir gumaziba, ia dagɨaba isa, me ginivi, me ariaghɨri. Dughiar avɨribar kɨ ian boriba akuv me mughasa, mati tuarir amebam uan avɨzimingɨn nguziba avarazɨ moghɨn, kɨ ia damuasa. Ezɨ ia na bagh izan aghua.
